cyclone.name: DORIAN
cyclone.current_location: about 10 miles WSW of Cape Hatteras, North Carolina
cyclone.trajectory: tracking northeastward along the U.S. East Coast, forecast to pass southeast of New England overnight Friday into early Saturday and then move into Nova Scotia

weather_observation.watch_coast: Tropical Storm Warning in effect for Woods Hole to Sagamore Beach MA, Nantucket and Martha's Vineyard MA
weather_observation.warning_coast: Hurricane Warning Surf City NC to NC/VA border; Tropical Storm Warning NC/VA border to Fenwick Island DE, lower Chesapeake Bay and Tidal Potomac
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Mid-Atlantic coast from North Carolina through Virginia, the offshore waters of southeastern New England including Cape Cod and Islands, and Atlantic Canada
weather_observation.wind: Low chance (≤4%) of sustained tropical-storm-force winds; occasional gusts 25–35 mph possible early Saturday
weather_observation.rainfall: 1–3 inches of rain possible, heaviest early Saturday morning
weather_observation.other_hazards: High surf and dangerous rip currents along the Massachusetts coastline
